subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: Eagles cornerback Nnamdi Asomugha, one of Philadelphia’s celebrated free-agent acquisitions, injured his left knee during a noncontact drill in practice and was taken off the field on a cart.
snippet: Eagles cornerback Nnamdi Asomugha, one of Philadelphia’s celebrated free-agent acquisitions, injured his left knee during a noncontact drill in practice and was taken off the field on a cart.
